name: Generate a default evaluation report for image binary classification problem

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for image binary classification
And a test dataset for image binary classification
And a uuid unique_identifier_this for the inference unit evaluation
And an evaluation plan file for image binary classification with no evaluation tasks and no report specification
And we read the evaluation plan
And with local report file location
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then the generated evaluation report contains a performance summary table section
Then the generated evaluation report contains a confusion matrix section
Then the specified dataset reference is in the report
Then the specified uuid is in the report

fullName: It must be possible to assess that an image binary classification inference unit behaves as intended: Generate a default evaluation report for image binary classification problem
